item.title: How Git decides when there's a merge conflict
item.description: An intuitive explanation of Git's merge behavior: three-way merges, hunks, and how overlapping patches produce conflicts.

item.title: Autocomplete everywhere that reads your mind
item.description: Building system-wide contextual autocomplete for macOS using accessibility tools and clipboard hijacking.

item.title: What happens to consumer AI when models stop getting smarter?
item.description: On the role of background context when models stop improving; a case for a personal AI memory store.

item.title: No code got the problem right and the solution wrong
How to pm
item.description: Notes on startup PMing based on experience running AI product at Bubble; adapted from a note to a friend hiring their first product person.
